long_description: Fast cars and long nights fueled the birth of NASCAR racing and Dale Earnhardt Jr.'s McCoy Sunglasses from Spy. They have Dale Jr.'s signature imprinted inside. Polycarbonate lenses are impact- and shatter-resistant, perfect for outdoor sports; lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays. Lightweight and comfortable, Propionate frames allow an even weight distribution across the nose. Modified-wrap 8-base lenses provide some eye protection from the sides. Rubber nose pads and temple tips become tackier with moisture, keeping your shades sitting securely on your face. Spy McCoy Sunglasses feature a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles.
short_description: Fast cars and long nights fueled the birth of NASCAR racing and Dale Earnhardt Jr.'s McCoy Sunglasses from Spy. They have Dale Jr.'s signature imprinted inside.
